text:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday bid a warm farewell to French President Francois Hollande, who left India after a three-day visit, expressing confidence that their discussions would further deepen the bilateral ties.

“Thank you President @fhollande for visiting India & gracing our Republic Day celebrations,” Mr. Modi tweeted. “India’s friendship with France is special... Am sure the discussions during President @fhollande’s visit will further deepen our relations,” he said in other tweets. He also tweeted a goodbye in French. — PTI
title: Au revoir, Hollande
